column1: Kata Robata////I really enjoyed lunch at Kata Robata. The food was phenomenal. I ended up getting a ramen noodle soup
column2: which they gladly made without meat to accommodate my vegetarian needs. My server was Lily and she was very sweet and helpful. My only complaints were that my food came out several minutes before my sister's food
column3: which is a huge pet peeve of mine
column4: and the hostess was not very helpful. When she saw me
column5: she just stared until I spoke. When I walked in
column6: I told her I was looking for my sister and if she could guide me in her direction that would be great. The hostess said she didn't remember anyone coming in and to just look around. I used to work as a hostess and that's not the optimal response
column8: it was great food and a very trendy atmosphere.
